title: 1.03 WATERS INCLUDED.
text: The concurrent jurisdiction of a county and of courts and officers exercising jurisdiction throughout it extends over the water area that would be included if the boundary lines of the county were produced in the direction of their approach and extended across the waters to the opposite shore.

variables.name: jurisdiction_type
variables.description: The type of jurisdiction being exercised.

variables.name: entity_type
variables.description: The type of entity exercising jurisdiction.

variables.name: boundary_extension
variables.description: The manner in which the boundary is extended.

consequences: The jurisdiction extends over the water area to the opposite shore.
